snippet: With two days left before Scots vote in a referendum on independence, the leaders of the three main British political parties sought to avert secession.
lead_paragraph: With two days left before Scots vote in a referendum on independence, the leaders of the three main British political parties sought to avert secession.

headline.main: London Repeats Offer of New Powers if Scotland Votes No
headline.print_headline: London Repeats Offer of New Powers if Scotland Votes No
